about_the_game:
Mira has decided to participate in an exhibition of mechanical animals! With the help of her friends Ash and Summer, Mira started looking for parts for her mechanical masterpiece. Help Mira finish her grand project! Earn coins and build a horse to your liking. Combine and replace parts. Play a variety of Spot the Difference mini-games. Explore a mysterious mechanical world with interesting characters!

150 colorful nonogram puzzles of all difficulty levels, a compelling story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a lot of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself!

Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help Mira and her friends finish their project!

- 150 colorful and memorable levels!
- Build a mechanical horse!
- Striking visual effects!
- Rich summer colors!
- An exciting adventure!
- Improve your logical and abstract thinking!
- User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
detailed_description:
Mira has decided to participate in an exhibition of mechanical animals! With the help of her friends Ash and Summer, Mira started looking for parts for her mechanical masterpiece. Help Mira finish her grand project! Earn coins and build a horse to your liking. Combine and replace parts. Play a variety of Spot the Difference mini-games. Explore a mysterious mechanical world with interesting characters!

150 colorful nonogram puzzles of all difficulty levels, a compelling story, and charming music will help you pass the time and have a lot of fun! Puzzles are a great opportunity to challenge yourself!

Complete levels, solve puzzles, and help Mira and her friends finish their project!

- 150 colorful and memorable levels!
- Build a mechanical horse!
- Striking visual effects!
- Rich summer colors!
- An exciting adventure!
- Improve your logical and abstract thinking!
- User-friendly interface and addictive gameplay!
name: Mira’s Workshop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7 Windows 8, Windows 10 (x86 and x64)
  • Processor: 1500 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 610 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2000 MHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 610 MB available space

short_description: Learn how to make a masterpiece from scrap materials! Mira's Workshop - Uncover hidden pictures!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Dutch, Russian
